content:
Hi all,
I am looking to cite Johnstone's Topos Theory (1977, Academic Press) but the particular part I'm looking at has some errors, at least in my Dover reprint. I was wondering whether an errata was ever published since I'd rather say Johnstone corrected himself. A google search has come up empty.
Many thanks.
I have never heard of errata being compiled....
My impression was that the Elephant was intended to replace Topos theory (though perhaps it does not totally subsume it?).
Perhaps when vol. 3 comes out we will have something closer to a full replacement... At the moment cohomology is not treated.
